title: Alteryx
tagline: Data analytics and automation for real estate.
description: Alteryx is an advanced data analytics platform that allows users to prepare, blend, and analyze data from multiple sources, with minimal coding required. It helps automate data-driven decisions and provides robust analytics tools, from predictive modeling to data visualization.

title: Altus Group
tagline: Trusted commercial real estate analytics.
description: Altus Group is a leading provider of software, data, and advisory services for the global commercial real estate industry. It offers solutions for valuation, risk management, and asset performance, allowing real estate professionals to optimize their decision-making.

title: Apto
tagline: Summary: Apto is an effective CRM solution tailored for commercial real estate (CRE) brokers. Its deal management tools make it a go-to for brokers lo.
description:
Summary: Apto is an effective CRM solution tailored for commercial real estate (CRE) brokers. Its deal management tools make it a go-to for brokers looking to streamline operations, though its limited customization may not suit all needs.

Features:

CRM system tailored for CRE brokers
Deal management capabilities
Broker-specific tools for tracking leads
Pros:

Tailored specifically for CRE professionals
Easy deal management
Improves brokerage workflows
Cons:

Limited flexibility for other real estate segments
Customization options are minimal
Rating: 4/5

title: Archibus
tagline: Real estate management software.
description: Archibus is a comprehensive real estate, infrastructure, and facilities management software. It helps organizations optimize space, reduce costs, and streamline operations through space management, asset management, and real estate portfolio management tools.

title: Architecture Helper
tagline: Architecture generation & analyzation software
description:
Summary: ArchitectureHelper.com is an innovative tool designed for architects, real estate developers, and urban planners to analyze architectural styles and building features. It provides AI-driven insights and visualizations to help users better understand historical and modern architectural trends. While incredibly powerful, its vast range of features may feel overwhelming for first-time users.

Features:

AI-powered architectural style analysis
Map-based building visualizations
Detailed reports on building design elements
Custom data integrations
Pros:

Advanced AI-driven analysis of architectural styles
Provides detailed and visual insights for building design
Ideal for professionals in architecture and real estate development
Cons:

Can be complex for new users to navigate initially
Some features may be overkill for casual users or smaller projects
Rating: 4.6/5

title: Argus
tagline: Leading real estate software solution.
description:
Summary: Argus is a leader in the commercial real estate valuation space, offering a comprehensive solution for market analysis. It’s a highly recommended tool for professionals who need reliable and detailed valuation data, though its complexity might pose a challenge for new users.

Features:

Market and property valuation analysis
Commercial real estate focused
Detailed reporting tools
Pros:

Highly regarded in the CRE valuation space
Comprehensive data for market analysis
Reliable reporting features
Cons:

Steep learning curve for new users
May not be suitable for smaller real estate transactions
Rating: 4.5/5

title: Avison Young
tagline: Global commercial real estate services.
description: Avison Young is a global commercial real estate firm providing services such as brokerage, property management, investment, and advisory solutions. It helps clients with market research, site selection, and property management for various commercial assets.

title: Bisnow
tagline: Commercial real estate news and events.
description: Bisnow is a media platform focusing on commercial real estate news, events, and education. It provides insights, market trends, and networking opportunities for professionals in the real estate industry, primarily through its digital publications and live events.

title: Brevitas
tagline: Find off-market commercial real estate deals.
description: Brevitas is a real estate marketplace focused on facilitating transactions between buyers and sellers of commercial properties. It offers tools for listing properties, conducting market research, and managing deal flow, targeting brokers, investors, and developers.

title: BrokerAssist
tagline: Optimize your brokerage operations.
description: BrokerAssist is a mobile app designed to connect real estate brokers and agents with each other for support, referrals, and collaboration. It enables real estate professionals to find colleagues for tasks, ask for assistance, and exchange leads in real-time.

title: Buildium
tagline: Property management software.
description:
Summary: Buildium is a comprehensive property management software designed for property managers who need streamlined, easy-to-use tools. While highly effective, it may not have all the features required for larger commercial properties.

Features:

Property management for residential real estate
Tenant and lease tracking
Financial management tools
Pros:

Easy-to-use interface
Ideal for small to mid-size residential properties
All-in-one property management
Cons:

Limited for large commercial property needs
Can become expensive as portfolios grow
Rating: 4/5

title: Buildout
tagline: Marketing and deal management made easy.
description:
Summary: Buildout is a deal and marketing management platform built for brokers, offering tools to streamline their marketing efforts and transaction management. While it's excellent for marketing, some users might find its customization options lacking.

Features:

Marketing and deal management for brokers
Automated marketing materials
Transaction management tools
Pros:

Streamlines marketing efforts
Easy-to-use interface
Great for managing multiple deals
Cons:

Limited customization for marketing materials
Requires a subscription for full feature access
Rating: 4.2/5

title: Capital Brain
tagline: Real estate investment management platform.
description: Capital Brain is an AI-driven platform that helps real estate investors discover and analyze potential investment opportunities. It uses machine learning to provide insights and market predictions, helping investors make informed decisions.

title: Catalyst
tagline: Marketing automation for real estate.
description: Catalyst is a marketing and CRM platform designed specifically for commercial real estate firms. It offers tools for managing marketing campaigns, tracking leads, and maintaining customer relationships in the CRE space.

title: Cherre
tagline: Data integration and analytics for real estate.
description:
Summary: Cherre is a powerful data integration and analytics platform designed for real estate professionals. It’s ideal for firms needing to aggregate data from various sources, though its complexity might not suit smaller businesses.

Features:

Data integration from multiple real estate sources
Advanced analytics and visualization tools
Tailored market analysis
Pros:

Comprehensive data aggregation
Powerful analytics tools
Great for in-depth market analysis
Cons:

Complex setup and integration
Best suited for larger firms with data teams
Rating: 4.5/5

tagline: Find and value off-market properties.
description:

Features:

Off-market property search
Valuation tools for real estate development
Market analysis and property evaluation
Pros:

Great for developers and investors seeking off-market deals
Reliable valuation tools
Easy property analysis
Cons:

Features may be too advanced for casual users
Limited to specific markets
Rating: 4.3/5

tagline: Commercial real estate data platform.
description:

Features:

Lease and sales comparables
Commercial real estate data and analytics
Market analysis tools
Pros:

Comprehensive data for market insights
Great for analysts and appraisers
Extensive lease and sale comparables
Cons:

Full data access can be costly
Not as suitable for casual users
Rating: 4.5/5

title: CoreLogic
tagline: Property information and analytics.
description: CoreLogic provides comprehensive data and analytics services for the real estate industry. Its solutions help real estate professionals, financial institutions, and insurance companies with property data, risk management, and market insights.

title: CoStar
tagline: Comprehensive commercial real estate data and analytics.
description:
Summary: CoStar is a comprehensive commercial real estate data and analytics platform, offering in-depth insights and listings. It’s essential for professionals needing access to a vast database of commercial properties and market analysis tools, though the cost may be prohibitive for smaller firms.

Extensive commercial real estate data
Market analysis and listing services
Analytics for property performance
Pros:

Vast database of commercial properties
Powerful market analysis tools
Regularly updated data
Cons:

Expensive, especially for small firms
Interface can be overwhelming for new users
Rating: 4.5/5

description: CREModels offers financial modeling, due diligence, and advisory services for commercial real estate. Their tools and services help developers, investors, and brokers assess the financial viability of real estate projects and transactions.

title: CREXi
tagline: Buy; sell; and lease commercial properties online.

Summary: CREXi provides a modern platform for buying, selling, and leasing commercial properties. It's an excellent option for brokers needing an easy-to-use, all-in-one platform, though some advanced features may require a paid subscription.

Commercial property listings for buying, selling, and leasing
Broker tools for deal management
Easy-to-use interface

Free basic tools for brokers
Streamlined deal management
Large inventory of properties

Advanced features require a subscription
Limited customization options

tagline: Investment management software for real estate.
description:

Deal and investment management tools
Collaboration features for investment teams
Tracking and reporting capabilities

Excellent for managing multiple deals
Comprehensive reporting tools
Great for investment teams

May be too complex for smaller teams
High subscription cost

tagline: Deal management platform for real estate investment teams.
description:

Deal and transaction management for investment teams
Collaboration tools for deal flow
Tracking and reporting capabilities
Pros:

Streamlines deal management
Excellent for large investment teams

Expensive for smaller firms

tagline: Energy management for real estate.

Energy management tools for real estate

Excellent for energy efficiency in large properties

Niche focus on energy may not appeal to all users

tagline: Automated vehicle-sharing platform.
description: Envoy Technologies is a platform offering electric vehicle sharing for real estate properties, providing on-demand EV rentals to tenants and employees. It promotes sustainability and convenience in mobility solutions for properties.

title: Fifth Wall
tagline: Real estate technology venture capital firm.
description: Fifth Wall is a venture capital firm that invests in startups disrupting the real estate industry. It focuses on technology-driven innovations that modernize real estate operations, including PropTech, sustainability, and infrastructure.

tagline: Automate business processes with AI.
description: FortressIQ offers process intelligence solutions that use AI to analyze business processes. While not specific to real estate, it helps large enterprises optimize operations, making it relevant for companies managing large portfolios or complex transactions.

title: FUEL
tagline: Marketing platform for real estate.
description: FUEL is a commercial real estate platform offering data-driven tools for brokers, investors, and developers. It helps users with deal analysis, market insights, and transaction management to optimize real estate investments.

title: HappyCo

tagline: Commercial real estate management platform.

Commercial real estate property management
Lease tracking and management
Reporting tools for portfolio performance
Pros:

Streamlines property management tasks
Easy-to-use interface
Great reporting features for large portfolios
Cons:

Can be too robust for smaller property managers
Subscription cost may be high for individual users

title: Investor Management Services
tagline: Investor reporting and communication software.

title: iSqFt

description: iSqFt is a construction bidding software that connects contractors and suppliers with commercial construction projects. It streamlines the preconstruction process by offering tools for project management, bid management, and collaboration across teams.

tagline: Integrated global real estate services.

tagline: Investor reporting and communication software.
description:

Investment management tools

Pros:

Great for managing investor relations
Detailed reporting features

Expensive for smaller teams

description: Real estate lending platform.

Advanced features may not suit smaller users

Commercial property listings for sale and lease
Simple search and filter tools
Wide network of commercial real estate listings

Easy-to-use interface

Paid features may be necessary for full access

tagline: 3D capture for real estate.

tagline: Real estate technology accelerator.
description: MetaProp is a venture capital firm focused on investing in PropTech startups. It supports innovation in real estate technology, backing companies that bring technological advancements to real estate markets, construction, and property management.

tagline: Data visualization and analytics for real estate.
description:

Excellent visualization tools

Can be complex for new users

tagline: Streamline permitting and licensing processes.

Permitting and licensing process management

Great for managing complex permitting processes

Instant access to comprehensive land parcel data
User-friendly map interface for easy navigation and selection
Flexible coverage options to suit various needs and budgets

title: Cavelit
tagline: Social media videos for real estate agents
description:
Cavelit will 4x your engagement
Get everything you need to grow your audience – from tailored video ideas to professional video editing.

Find your next video idea
Browse our library of proven scripts that have already gone viral in other markets, and get it automatically tailored to yours.

Get professional editing
Once you've shot your video, we'll edit the raw footage into a professional and authentic video ready to post on social media.

Go viral in your local market
Post and follow up with potential clients who engaged with your videos – you'll be shocked at the difference it makes to connect after they've already shown interest in your content!

title: CRE Data Extractor
tagline: Stop manually extracting text from images of rent rolls, use CRE Data Extractor to get your rent roll into a csv format in minutes
description: CRE Data extractor allows users to turn their rent rolls that are in image format (JPG, PNG, PDF) into a csv format, making them much easier to use in financial models.

title: Comp Crunch
tagline: Export your zillow search
description:
Zillow provides users with the ability to look at tons of real estate data online which is amazing, but sometimes you need a wholistic view of the data so you can do your own analysis. 

With the Comp Crunch Chrome extension, you can easily analyze and/or export any Zillow search. This saves you time spent talking to real estate agents or laboriously copy and pasting data points into excel! We offer the ability to export your Zillow search data as either a PDF or CSV file. Additionally, we provide a quick summary of your searched area by showing the average, median, 25th percentile and 75th percentile prices of the results in your search. You also can see how sold homes have trended in an area over time.

title: Mustwants
tagline: Visual Collaborative Decision Making for buyers, renters that permits Real Estate Professionals to engage with clients and reduce the stress of relocation..
description: Designed by military to address the challenges of relocation and home search remotely and many times separated from their partner.  Designed to collaboratively search and communicate ranked homes and points of interest with their chosen agent.

title: Deal Nav
tagline: A simple and affordable CRM and Deal Management tool for high-value real estate deals and contacts.
description: DealNav is a database where you can search, sort, prioritize, and assign reminders to important deals and contacts, all of which are displayed on an integrated and interactive map. Assign text and/or email alerts to remind you when to follow up with a contact, or to complete a task for a deal. Filter your data by contact, location, type, priority, and more to create custom lists, all exportable in Excel. Search every word in every field of the entire database. Your data will never be shared or sold and can easily be exported by you, at any time. Flexible & affordable monthly or annual payment options, cancel anytime.

title: Appraisal Inbox
tagline: Appraisal Inbox combines appraisal order tracking, workflow automation, scheduling, contact management, and communication tools into one comprehensive real estate appraisal software package.
description:
Appraisal Inbox is an appraisal software designed for real estate appraisers. It combines order tracking, workflow automation, scheduling, contact management, and communication tools into one platform. This software helps appraisers streamline their appraisal business, from managing orders to delivering value to clients.

The software provides an appraisal assignment log that tracks orders through each step of the valuation process. This ensures appraisers are informed about the status of an order. Appraisal Inbox also includes a team calendar, scheduling features, and automated reminders to help appraisers meet client deadlines and deliver appraisals on time. Additionally, the software stores all order information and work files in a secure database with daily backups, providing search and filtering capabilities.

Appraisal Inbox offers reporting tools that automatically calculate important business metrics. This helps appraisers make informed decisions by focusing on key trends. The software also makes collaboration simple, with configurable user roles and permissions, as well as automatic commission tracking.

title: Deco Base
tagline: Deco Base makes AI powered tools for Real Estate Developers. We help automate manual, document based workflows like Bank Draws and Plan Checks.
description:
Deco Base can ingest all of the documents that real estate developers are likely to come across - everything from investment documents, to invoices, to architectural plans, to loan docs, to insurance agreements. We automatically categorize and organize that data and use it to build a knowledge base of your project. You can model everything related to your project directly within Deco Base, or alternatively can download the extracted info to use in excel models. 

With the knowledge base, Deco Base is able to automate and perfectly execute many of the document based tasks that developers have to do. Things like submitting bank draws, completing diligence requests, or responding to plan check comments. Additionally, Deco Base has an AI chat bot that has access to the full context of your projects.

title: Dealz: Real Estate Estimator
tagline: Estimate and calculate residential properties
description: This app helps users search any zip code for on market real estate properties, then estimate, and compare prices and property details. All property details organized in a zip code will be listed and sorted to make life easier for home shoppers. Users can also export property details onto a spreadsheet.

title: Realie Property Data API
tagline: details on 180 million property parcels
description:
We're thrilled to announce the launch of Realie.ai's Property Data API! 🏡✨

At Realie.ai, we’ve reimagined property data collection and accessibility, leveraging AI-powered automation to streamline data collection from every county in the United States. This innovation allows us to keep overhead low, passing those savings directly to you with prices that beat competitors—without sacrificing quality.

What Makes Our API Different?
💡 Flexible Search
Tired of rigid search options? So were we. That’s why we built Apache Lucene-powered search into our API, offering lightning-fast, flexible queries that make finding the exact data you need a breeze.

📊 Advanced Analytics
We’re not just providing data—we’re building free analytics around it. Our platform will help you unlock powerful insights, no extra costs required.

🤖 AI-Powered Insights
Our work doesn’t stop at raw data. We’re training machine learning models to create a cost-effective, accurate AVM (Automated Valuation Model) and developing an assistant powered by RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation). This assistant will help you:

Discover insights hidden in the data
Generate custom analytics
Digest large datasets seamlessly
🌎 Comprehensive Coverage
Our API covers every corner of the U.S., giving you access to rich, nationwide property data in one place.

title: MapZot.AI
tagline: MapZot.AI is an AI-powered platform that provides real-time insights into site selection, competitor analysis, and market trends to help businesses identify the most profitable locations.
description:
MapZot.AI is an advanced AI-powered platform designed to assist businesses in making data-driven site selection and market analysis decisions. By leveraging cutting-edge machine learning and geospatial analytics, MapZot.AI provides real-time insights into key factors such as competitor density, customer demographics, tourism trends, and economic conditions. This allows businesses—especially in the hospitality, retail, and real estate industries—to identify the most profitable locations for expansion or new development.

With its intuitive interface and powerful analytics, MapZot.AI simplifies complex data analysis, enabling users to assess market demand, understand consumer behavior, and optimize pricing strategies. Whether selecting a hotel site, opening a new store, or expanding a business, MapZot.AI delivers actionable intelligence to ensure strategic and profitable decision-making

title: TerraPrime
tagline: TerraPrime is a SaaS platform that connects commercial real estate developers with investors, streamlining transactions and enabling cities to access global investment for sustainable local growth.
description: TerraPrime is a groundbreaking, broker-free platform poised to transform the global commercial real estate industry. By directly connecting visionary developers with forward-thinking investors, TerraPrime eliminates traditional intermediaries, fostering seamless and efficient transactions. Its innovative TerraPublic initiative empowers cities, municipalities, and regional authorities to access global investment resources, driving sustainable local growth and urban development. With a user-centric, mobile-first design, TerraPrime offers an intuitive interface that streamlines high-value real estate partnerships, breaking down conventional networking barriers in the industry. By leveraging advanced technology and a commitment to transparency, TerraPrime is redefining how commercial real estate deals are conducted, making the process more accessible and efficient for all stakeholders involved.

title: Latapult GIS
tagline: Latapult is a premier Geographic Information System (GIS) platform for anyone who needs to understand land.
description:
Latapult is a premier Geographic Information System (GIS) platform for anyone who needs to understand land. We arm our commercial and residential real estate clients with the most comprehensive, up-to-date data spanning the entire United States. From data layers detailing land ownership and zoning to points of interest, developers can search, manage, and evaluate land data 50x faster in Latapult based on exact specifications.

Backed by GIS experts with roots in geospatial data analysis, Latapult is a trusted partner, helping land, commercial, and residential development professionals complete successful projects through collaborative tools and deep insights.

title: Casafy AI
tagline: Search for value add properties across the United States
description:
Casafy transforms real estate investment by making properties searchable based on their actual condition and features across the entire United States. This innovative platform addresses one of the most persistent challenges facing real estate investors: the time-consuming and often ineffective process of manually scouting neighborhoods or relying on incomplete data to identify distressed or neglected properties. Instead of driving countless miles or making educated guesses, investors can now efficiently locate opportunities at scale through intelligent, data-driven search capabilities.

For value-added investors, Casafy represents a breakthrough in off-market property discovery. The platform is the first of its kind to identify distressed properties based on their physical condition, powered by a proprietary AI model that analyzes street-level data across North America. This technology enables investors to pinpoint properties with renovation potential or condition-based indicators that traditional listing services simply cannot capture, giving them a significant competitive advantage in finding lucrative investment opportunities before they become widely known in the market.

title: PropTracer
tagline: PropTracer is the top U.S. skip-tracing platform that provides commercial and residential real estate professionals with accurate owner phone and email data in seconds.
description:
PropTracer is the best skip tracing platform in the United States. It allows commercial real estate agents, investors, and wholesalers to pull property owners' contact information (phone numbers and emails) with 95% accuracy. Our software works in real time, in seconds, and pierces through corporate structures like LLCs and LPs to identify the ultimate decision maker behind any commercial or residential property.

PropTracer is affordable and unmatched in accuracy and data quality, making it a powerful tool for closing off-market deals, finding leads, and generating more opportunities for commercial and residential real estate professionals.

title: Elementix
tagline: Elementix is a borrower intelligence platform that lets private lenders search real estate investors by name and understand their experience, activity, and lending patterns.
description:
Elementix gives private lenders a clear view of the real people behind borrowing entities. The platform extracts signatures from county documents, connects them to mortgage records, and builds unified borrower profiles that show loans, properties, partners, and market activity. Lenders can finally search investors by name with accuracy, not guesswork.

Beyond identity resolution, Elementix delivers advanced insights that help lenders source new opportunities, monitor client behavior, and spot churn risk earlier. With enriched contact information, portfolio context, and borrower movement data across markets, Elementix becomes a single source of truth for understanding who your borrowers are and how they operate.
